MESSAGE.JP: から、せめて人っぽく動かしなさいよ！
MESSAGE.EN: Come on, at least make them move like people!
MESSAGE.Translation: Come on, at least make them move like people!

MESSAGE.JP: のは魚か、ああ!?
MESSAGE.EN: Was that a fish just now!?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was that a fish just now!?

MESSAGE.JP: う動けばなんでもいいのかしら…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was as though he didn't care anymore, as long as they moved...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was as though he didn't care anymore, as long as they moved...

MESSAGE.JP: れもそうだけど、このフロア…。
MESSAGE.EN: Regardless, this floor...
MESSAGE.Translation: Regardless, this floor...

MESSAGE.JP: う。
MESSAGE.EN: It felt wrong.
MESSAGE.Translation: It felt wrong.

MESSAGE.JP: 路に出なくても、すでに違和感がある。
MESSAGE.EN: I hadn't even started walking yet and something already felt off.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hadn't even started walking yet and something already felt off.

MESSAGE.JP: 変もここまできたか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Had so much really changed...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Had so much really changed...?

MESSAGE.JP: れまで通りにはいかなさそうね。
MESSAGE.EN: This level would likely be very different from before.
MESSAGE.Translation: This level would likely be very different from before.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「ここに隠し通路があるわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝There's a hidden path here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝There's a hidden path here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？　どうしてわかるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What? How do you know?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What? How do you know?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「才能があるからよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It's a talent.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It's a talent.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そりゃ、そうだね…スパイなんだもんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, that's right... you're a spy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, that's right... you're a spy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「壁を爆破するから、隠れててね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I'm going to blow up the wall, so take cover.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I'm going to blow up the wall, so take cover.❞

MESSAGE.JP: じことの繰り返しだけど、爆薬量の計算が毎回必要だからちょっと手間ね。
MESSAGE.EN: I was doing the exact same thing I did before, but it still took a while because I had to get the amount of explosive right each time.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was doing the exact same thing I did before, but it still took a while because I had to get the amount of explosive right each time.

MESSAGE.JP: 置も終了して、起爆っと。
MESSAGE.EN: I finished placing it and set it off.
MESSAGE.Translation: I finished placing it and set it off.

MESSAGE.JP: ーーーん！
MESSAGE.EN: *Boooom!*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Boooom!*

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごほ…すごいね、本当にあった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝*Cough*... amazing. There really was one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝*Cough*... amazing. There really was one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「さらに奧にもあるわよ。ここにいなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝There's another one further in. Wait here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝There's another one further in. Wait here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は爆薬の量を少なめにして、効率よくしてみよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I reduced the amount of explosive I used on the next one in an attempt to be efficient.
MESSAGE.Translation: I reduced the amount of explosive I used on the next one in an attempt to be efficient.

MESSAGE.JP: ーーーん！
MESSAGE.EN: *Boooom!*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Boooom!*

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「左。こっちよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Left. This way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Left. This way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんな、ずかずかと行って大丈夫なのっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is it really okay to just rush right in!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is it really okay to just rush right in!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「大丈夫よ。天才だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It's fine. I'm a genius.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It's fine. I'm a genius.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ねぇ、ぐるっともう一周してきたよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, haven't we already gone all the way around once?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, haven't we already gone all the way around once?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「マップ見せて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Let me see the map.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Let me see the map.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.EN: What...?
MESSAGE.Translation: What...?

MESSAGE.JP: う壁を破壊しても王の字にならないぞ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if we destroyed some of the walls, we wouldn't be able to get the right shape.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if we destroyed some of the walls, we wouldn't be able to get the right shape.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうしたの？　そんな髪をかき乱して…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's wrong? Your hair's all over the place...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's wrong? Your hair's all over the place...❞

MESSAGE.JP: え。気づかなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Huh? I didn't notice.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Huh? I didn't notice.

MESSAGE.JP: めてクールに、だ。頭を左右に振って顔にかかっている髪を振りどけた。
MESSAGE.EN: Gotta try and be cool. I shook my head to get the hair out of my face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Gotta try and be cool. I shook my head to get the hair out of my face.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「いい？　理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Here's the deal, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Here's the deal, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「この階には隠し通路があるのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝There are hidden paths on this floor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝There are hidden paths on this floor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「へぇ、よくわかったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wow, it's amazing you figured that out right away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wow, it's amazing you figured that out right away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「なので、爆薬を使って壁を壊します」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝We're going to use explosives to destroy the walls.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝We're going to use explosives to destroy the walls.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「最終的には隠し通路も合わせて、この階のマップは何かの形になるのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Once we find all the hidden paths, the map should resemble something recognizable.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Once we find all the hidden paths, the map should resemble something recognizable.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「字かもしれない。絵かもしれない。マークかもしれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Maybe a character. Maybe a picture. Maybe a symbol.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Maybe a character. Maybe a picture. Maybe a symbol.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「それを前もって考えて、効率よく隠し通路を見つけたいわけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝With that in mind, we only have so many chances to find the hidden paths.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝With that in mind, we only have so many chances to find the hidden paths.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「爆薬も数に限りがあるしね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I only have so many explosives.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I only have so many explosives.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「理樹くんは、どう読むかしら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Does it look like anything to you, Riki-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Does it look like anything to you, Riki-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「さあ…ここからは何にでもなりそうだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well... at this point it could be anything...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well... at this point it could be anything...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ここの壁とかどうだろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How about this wall?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How about this wall?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「信じていいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Are you sure?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Are you sure?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん…期待されると困るけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No... I wouldn't get your hopes up...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No... I wouldn't get your hopes up...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「まあ、いいわ。爆破してみる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Whatever. Let's blow it up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Whatever. Let's blow it up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 土遊びみたいにぺたぺた貼り付けて、ケーブル繋いで。
MESSAGE.EN: I applied some explosive to the wall as if I were playing with clay and connected the cable.
MESSAGE.Translation: I applied some explosive to the wall as if I were playing with clay and connected the cable.

MESSAGE.JP: 火用コードを伸ばしながら隠れて、起爆。
MESSAGE.EN: We hid as I laid out the ignition cord, then I set it off.
MESSAGE.Translation: We hid as I laid out the ignition cord, then I set it off.

MESSAGE.JP: ーーーーーーんっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Boooooom!*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Boooooom!*

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「みごとになにもないわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝A whole lotta nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝A whole lotta nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、ごめん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ここの壁はどう？　怪しくない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How about this wall? Isn't it suspicious?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How about this wall? Isn't it suspicious?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「あなたが怪しいと思うなら、賭けてみるわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝If you think it's suspicious, I'll take the chance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝If you think it's suspicious, I'll take the chance.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ラスチック爆弾は手軽で使いやすいけど、コードが重いのが難点ね。
MESSAGE.EN: Plastic explosives were really easy to use, but the cord was heavy.
MESSAGE.Translation: Plastic explosives were really easy to use, but the cord was heavy.

MESSAGE.JP: いまわしできる着火用コードってないかしら…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wondered if reusable cords existed...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wondered if reusable cords existed...

MESSAGE.JP: ーーーーーーんっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Boooooom!*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Boooooom!*

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「連続ではずれね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Another miss.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Another miss.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、ごめん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「数に限りがあるんだから、慎重に選んでよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝We only have so many, so we need to pick carefully.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝We only have so many, so we need to pick carefully.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ここの壁は絶対だよっ、すごくこう…通路が隠れてるっぽいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This one, definitely. It really feels like it's hiding a path.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This one, definitely. It really feels like it's hiding a path.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「じゃあ、爆破してみる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Okay, I'm gonna blow it up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Okay, I'm gonna blow it up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 管を刺すから爆発するけど、火をつけたらゆっくり燃えるのよね、これ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I put the fuse in so that it would explode, but when I light it, it would burn slowly...
MESSAGE.Translation: I put the fuse in so that it would explode, but when I light it, it would burn slowly...

MESSAGE.JP: ーーーーーーんっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Boooooom!*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Boooooom!*

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「うわぁ…ここもハズレ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Wow... another miss.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Wow... another miss.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「あなた、逆に才能を感じるわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝You've got a talent for getting it wrong...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝You've got a talent for getting it wrong...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「こんな才能いらないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't want that kind of talent...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't want that kind of talent...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ここが怪しくない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Isn't this spot suspicious?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Isn't this spot suspicious?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「あなた、新しくできた通路のほうが怪しいと思わないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Don't you think any newly made path is suspicious?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Don't you think any newly made path is suspicious?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、言われてみれば、そうだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Now that you mention it, yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Now that you mention it, yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「やばい、パートナーが馬鹿だ…更迭しなくちゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Crap, my partner is an idiot... I need a do-over...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Crap, my partner is an idiot... I need a do-over...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えー、勘弁してよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, give me a break!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, give me a break!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「じゃ、あっちね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Okay, this way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Okay, this way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ここが怪しくない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Isn't this spot suspicious?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Isn't this spot suspicious?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「やばい、パートナーが馬鹿だ…更迭しなくちゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Crap, my partner is an idiot... I need a do-over...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Crap, my partner is an idiot... I need a do-over...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ここが怪しくない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Isn't this spot suspicious?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Isn't this spot suspicious?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「そうね。あたしもそう思ってたところ。あなた、才能あるんじゃない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Yeah. I was just thinking the same thing. Maybe you have the talent too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Yeah. I was just thinking the same thing. Maybe you have the talent too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、そうかな…照れるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You think so? I'm flattered...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You think so? I'm flattered...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「爆破するわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I'm gonna blow it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I'm gonna blow it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ここが怪しくない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Isn't this spot suspicious?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Isn't this spot suspicious?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「そうね。あたしもそう思ってたところ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Yeah. I was just thinking the same thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Yeah. I was just thinking the same thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「じゃ、爆破するわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Okay, I'm gonna blow it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Okay, I'm gonna blow it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ここが怪しくない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Isn't this spot suspicious?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Isn't this spot suspicious?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「あなた、どこでも怪しいって言うじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Don't just go around saying that everywhere.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Don't just go around saying that everywhere.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごめん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「でも、ここが怪しいのは同感ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝But I get the same feeling here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝But I get the same feeling here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「爆破するわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Let's blow it up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Let's blow it up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「残るはここね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝This is the last one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝This is the last one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「消去法になって助かったわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝The process of elimination was a big help.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝The process of elimination was a big help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ほんとごめん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm really sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm really sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ４を必要分だけナイフで切り取って、弱そうなところに貼り付ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I cut off the right amount of C4 and stuck it on what looked to be a weak spot.
MESSAGE.Translation: I cut off the right amount of C4 and stuck it on what looked to be a weak spot.

MESSAGE.JP: の大きさなら…３箇所もあればいいか。
MESSAGE.EN: Given the size... 3 points would be enough.
MESSAGE.Translation: Given the size... 3 points would be enough.

MESSAGE.JP: トコードで３箇所を繋いで、信管を差し込む。
MESSAGE.EN: I connected the detonation cord to all 3 points and inserted the fuse.
MESSAGE.Translation: I connected the detonation cord to all 3 points and inserted the fuse.

MESSAGE.JP: イムヒューズを繋げて…と、よし、できた。
MESSAGE.EN: I connected the timed fuse... and with that I was done.
MESSAGE.Translation: I connected the timed fuse... and with that I was done.

MESSAGE.JP: のままコードをくるくると解きながら、理樹くんの横に座る。
MESSAGE.EN: I unwound the detonating cord and went to sit next to Riki-kun.
MESSAGE.Translation: I unwound the detonating cord and went to sit next to Riki-kun.

MESSAGE.JP: 60発火装置をセットして、軽く金属ピンを引き抜くと――
MESSAGE.EN: I set the M60 incendiary device and lightly pulled the pin.
MESSAGE.Translation: I set the M60 incendiary device and lightly pulled the pin.

MESSAGE.JP: ーーーーーーんっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Boooooom!*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Boooooom!*

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「甲という漢字にはなったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It looks like the character for ❛armor❜ (甲) now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It looks like the character for ❛armor❜ (甲) now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「なったのはいいけど、わけがわからないわね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It does, but that doesn't make any sense...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It does, but that doesn't make any sense...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「部首と考えたらどう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Maybe it's part of a bigger character?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Maybe it's part of a bigger character?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「そうね…まだ仕掛けのある部屋も見つかっていない。なら、続きがあると考えるべきね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝True... we still haven't found a room with anything in it. Meaning we should probably keep looking.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝True... we still haven't found a room with anything in it. Meaning we should probably keep looking.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも甲が部首の漢字って何があるかなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But what characters have this shape in it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But what characters have this shape in it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「岬とか…鴨とか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝The one for ❛cape❜ (岬)... or ❛duck❜ (鴨) maybe...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝The one for ❛cape❜ (岬)... or ❛duck❜ (鴨) maybe...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、愚かだとか、偶然の偶だとか、そういう字にも使われてる。結構多いんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Or maybe something like ❛foolish❜ (愚) or ❛unexpected❜ (偶). There are a lot of possibilities.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Or maybe something like ❛foolish❜ (愚) or ❛unexpected❜ (偶). There are a lot of possibilities.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「ええー、どうやって絞り込むのよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝No way, how are we supposed to narrow it down?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝No way, how are we supposed to narrow it down?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「絞り込めない以上、爆薬を仕掛けて探すしかないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We'll just have to keep trying with the explosives until we can narrow it down...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We'll just have to keep trying with the explosives until we can narrow it down...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「数に限りがあるってのに、もう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I told you we only have so many. Geez...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I told you we only have so many. Geez...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「断然ここが怪しいよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This place is definitely suspicious.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This place is definitely suspicious.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「そうね。できたばかりの通路だもの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Yeah. It's the path we just opened up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Yeah. It's the path we just opened up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「じゃ、ここに爆弾しかけるわ。下がっていて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Okay, let's blow this spot up. Get back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Okay, let's blow this spot up. Get back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ここが怪しくない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Isn't this spot suspicious?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Isn't this spot suspicious?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「あなた、どこでもそう言うわね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝You'll say that anywhere...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝You'll say that anywhere...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごめん…やっぱり何もないよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry... I guess it's nothing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry... I guess it's nothing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「断然怪しいわよ。できたばかりの通路だもの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It's definitely suspicious. It's the path we just opened up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It's definitely suspicious. It's the path we just opened up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「じゃ、ここに爆弾しかけるわ。下がっていて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Okay, let's blow this spot up. Get back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Okay, let's blow this spot up. Get back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: くつかのひびを手がかりにして、強度をチェックしてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I found a couple of cracks and checked their strength.
MESSAGE.Translation: I found a couple of cracks and checked their strength.

MESSAGE.JP: 算で必要なグラム数を割り出して、ナイフで切り出す。本当は測った方がいいんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: I did the math in my head and cut off the right amount. It would have been better if I had the means to measure it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I did the math in my head and cut off the right amount. It would have been better if I had the means to measure it.

MESSAGE.JP: とは手が覚えている作業を繰り返すだけ。
MESSAGE.EN: I did the rest from muscle memory.
MESSAGE.Translation: I did the rest from muscle memory.

MESSAGE.JP: ーーーーーーんっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Boooooom!*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Boooooom!*

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「でたわね、隠し通路」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝There you have it, a hidden path.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝There you have it, a hidden path.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやっほーーーーぅ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yahoooooooo!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yahoooooooo!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「いくらへこんでたからって、喜びすぎよ、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝After being let down so many times, you're a little too happy, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝After being let down so many times, you're a little too happy, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: たしたちはまだ粉塵の舞う通路へ飛び出した。
MESSAGE.EN: We rushed into the still dusty corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: We rushed into the still dusty corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: 右を見渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked both ways.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked both ways.

MESSAGE.JP: 手には通路の先に部屋があるようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: There seemed to be a room to the left.
MESSAGE.Translation: There seemed to be a room to the left.

MESSAGE.JP: 手の先には曲がり角。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a corner to the right.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a corner to the right.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「先に左手の部屋の中を見ておきたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I want to look in the room to the left.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I want to look in the room to the left.❞

MESSAGE.JP: たしは銃を構え、慎重に歩き始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I readied my gun and cautiously started walking.
MESSAGE.Translation: I readied my gun and cautiously started walking.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「さっき、左手の部屋を見ておきたいって言わなかったっけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Didn't you say you wanted to look in the room to the left?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Didn't you say you wanted to look in the room to the left?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「その通りよ。いきましょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Exactly. Let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Exactly. Let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「やっぱりこっちに進むの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So we're going this way, after all?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So we're going this way, after all?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「いいえ、左手の部屋が先よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝No, we're going to the room to the left.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝No, we're going to the room to the left.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だったらいこうよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then let's go...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then let's go...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「左手にいくんでしょ？　とっとといこうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We're going left, aren't we? Let's hurry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We're going left, aren't we? Let's hurry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「あたしだってわかってるわよっ！　あーーーっ、うっさいな!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I know that! God, you are so annoying!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I know that! God, you are so annoying!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわ、ごめん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「左手にいくんでしょ？　とっとといこうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We're going left, aren't we? Let's hurry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We're going left, aren't we? Let's hurry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「何度も言わなくても、わかってるわよ！　いくわよ!!　いったらいいんでしょ!?　いってあげるわよ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝You don't need to keep saying it!! I'm going! Will that make you happy!? I'll go just for you!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝You don't need to keep saying it!! I'm going! Will that make you happy!? I'll go just for you!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん…よろしく…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes... please...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes... please...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「左手にいくんでしょ？　とっとといこうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We're going left, aren't we? Let's hurry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We're going left, aren't we? Let's hurry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「わかってるわよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I know!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I know!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 屋の中には、ぽつんと棺だけが安置されている。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a sarcophagus sitting in the middle of the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a sarcophagus sitting in the middle of the room.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@（こういうところだけは、わざと似せてあるのね…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@(So this is the only thing that's the same...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@(So this is the only thing that's the same...)

MESSAGE.JP: い気持ちはしない。
MESSAGE.EN: I had a bad premonition.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had a bad premonition.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あれは…棺桶？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is that... a sarcophagus?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is that... a sarcophagus?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「そうね。棺ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Yes. A sarcophagus.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Yes. A sarcophagus.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「中にはミイラがあるのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's a mummy inside, isn't there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's a mummy inside, isn't there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「多分そうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Probably.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Probably.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃ、トラップだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, it's a trap.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, it's a trap.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「反対側にも同じ棺桶があるはず。あたしたちはどちらかを選ぶことになるのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝There should be another one on the other side. We have to pick one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝There should be another one on the other side. We have to pick one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「へぇ、よくわかるね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wow, you know a lot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wow, you know a lot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 樹くんの感心はよそに、あたしは通路を引き返し始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I ignored Riki-kun's admiration and started back toward the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ignored Riki-kun's admiration and started back toward the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: 屋に辿りつくと、やはりさっきの部屋と同じ、棺桶が安置されていた。
MESSAGE.EN: As expected, when we arrived there was a sarcophagus just like in the other room.
MESSAGE.Translation: As expected, when we arrived there was a sarcophagus just like in the other room.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「マップはなんの形になった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝What does the map look like?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝What does the map look like?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「奇妙な字になったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Some weird character.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Some weird character.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「何よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Which one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Which one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ップを見せてもらう。そこに出来上がっていた文字、それは…。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at the map. The character it showed was...
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at the map. The character it showed was...

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「こんな字あるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Is this an actual character?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Is this an actual character?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「はこ…かな、たぶん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think it means ❛box.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think it means ❛box.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「はこ…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Box...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Box...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: かにまるでその字は亀が箱に囲われているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked like a turtle in a box.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked like a turtle in a box.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「馬鹿にされてるようで癪ね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I hate being made fun of...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I hate being made fun of...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「まるで、おまえらはこの匣からは出られない、とでも言いたげじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝They're just taunting us, saying ❛you'll never get out of this box.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝They're just taunting us, saying ❛you'll never get out of this box.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wonder...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wonder...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「さて、決心の時ね。どちらの棺を開けるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Well, time to make a decision. Which one do we open?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Well, time to make a decision. Which one do we open?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「この文字は、ヒントじゃないのかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you think the character on the map is a hint?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you think the character on the map is a hint?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「もしかしたら棺のことを表してるのかもしれないけど、どちらか一方を示唆してるようには見えないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It could be showing a sarcophagus, but it doesn't look like it's telling us which one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It could be showing a sarcophagus, but it doesn't look like it's telling us which one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nope...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nope...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 解はふたつにひとつ。不正解なら、死。
MESSAGE.EN: The correct answer was one of the two. The wrong answer meant death.
MESSAGE.Translation: The correct answer was one of the two. The wrong answer meant death.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「向こうにするわ。いきましょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It's the other one. Let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It's the other one. Let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: うだ。さっき向こうにすると決めたじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: That's right. Didn't I already decide it was the other one?
MESSAGE.Translation: That's right. Didn't I already decide it was the other one?

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「出ましょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: うだ。さっき向こうにすると決めたじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: That's right. Didn't I already decide it was the other one?
MESSAGE.Translation: That's right. Didn't I already decide it was the other one?

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「出ましょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「あたしが開けるから、理樹くんは部屋の外に出てて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I'm going to open it, so go outside.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I'm going to open it, so go outside.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんな無責任なことできないよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can't do something that irresponsible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can't do something that irresponsible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「ありがと。ただね、責任はすべてあたしにあるのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Thanks. But all the responsibility lies with me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Thanks. But all the responsibility lies with me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「だからいいの。出てって頂戴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝So it's fine. Please go outside.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝So it's fine. Please go outside.❞

MESSAGE.JP: だ不満があるのか返事はなかったが、気配はなくなった。
MESSAGE.EN: He didn't voice his dissatisfaction, and left the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: He didn't voice his dissatisfaction, and left the room.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「さて、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Well, okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Well, okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ラップが発動したとき、どうにか生き延びる方法はないか？
MESSAGE.EN: Was there any way to survive setting off the trap?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was there any way to survive setting off the trap?

MESSAGE.JP: は持ち上げないと開かないから、小道具を使っての遠隔操作は利かない。
MESSAGE.EN: If I didn't lift the lid, it wouldn't open, so using a remote controlled gadget wouldn't work.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I didn't lift the lid, it wouldn't open, so using a remote controlled gadget wouldn't work.

MESSAGE.JP: で開けるしかない。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to open it with my hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to open it with my hands.

MESSAGE.JP: ると、中からどんな凶暴な化け物が出てこようと自衛のすべはない。
MESSAGE.EN: When I do, some violent monster might come out and I'd have no way to defend myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I do, some violent monster might come out and I'd have no way to defend myself.

MESSAGE.JP: をくくるしかない…。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to prepare myself for the worst...
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to prepare myself for the worst...

MESSAGE.JP: っちが正解なはず。大丈夫だ。
MESSAGE.EN: This was probably the right one. I'd be fine.
MESSAGE.Translation: This was probably the right one. I'd be fine.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「いくわよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Here I go...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Here I go...❞

MESSAGE.JP: たしは棺の前に跪き、蓋に手をかけた。
MESSAGE.EN: I kneeled in front of the sarcophagus and put my hands on the lid.
MESSAGE.Translation: I kneeled in front of the sarcophagus and put my hands on the lid.

MESSAGE.JP: れを天井向けて、一気に剥いだ。
MESSAGE.EN: With one big heave, I lifted it toward the ceiling.
MESSAGE.Translation: With one big heave, I lifted it toward the ceiling.

MESSAGE.JP: て、どうするか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, what should I do...
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, what should I do...

MESSAGE.JP: ちらが正解よね。
MESSAGE.EN: This was the right one.
MESSAGE.Translation: This was the right one.

MESSAGE.JP: らん！　蓋が床を転がる。
MESSAGE.EN: *Thump!* The lid falls to the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Thump!* The lid falls to the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: 桶の底には、下に続く梯子が。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a ladder going down at the bottom of the sarcophagus.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a ladder going down at the bottom of the sarcophagus.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「ぃよっしゃああっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Hell yeah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Hell yeah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: わず拳を固めてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Without thinking, I thrust my fist into the air.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without thinking, I thrust my fist into the air.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「よしっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Alright!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Alright!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ろで理樹くんも、ガッツポーズをしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki-kun was fist pumping behind me too.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki-kun was fist pumping behind me too.

MESSAGE.JP: の姿を見て、もう取り繕う必要もないか…とあたしは思い始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: When I saw that, I started to think that maybe it was okay to be myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I saw that, I started to think that maybe it was okay to be myself.

MESSAGE.JP: て、どうするか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, what should I do...
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, what should I do...

MESSAGE.JP: っちはハズレなわけだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: This is the wrong one.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is the wrong one.

MESSAGE.JP: しゃ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Slash.*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Slash.*

MESSAGE.JP: 利な何かが胸を貫いていた…。
MESSAGE.EN: Something sharp stabbed through my chest...
MESSAGE.Translation: Something sharp stabbed through my chest...

MESSAGE.JP: しゃ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Slash.*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Slash.*

MESSAGE.JP: りゃ、さっきと同じことしてないか…あたし…。
MESSAGE.EN: Hey, didn't I just do this...
MESSAGE.Translation: Hey, didn't I just do this...

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「さあ、死ぬわよーっ！　ヘイ、トラップカモーーーーン！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Alright, I'm gonna die! Hey, come on trap!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Alright, I'm gonna die! Hey, come on trap!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: しゃ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Slash.*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Slash.*

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「やっぱり、向こうにするわ。でましょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It's the other one after all. Let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It's the other one after all. Let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「やっぱりこっちはないわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It's not this one after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It's not this one after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どっちからでもいいんじゃない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Does it really matter which one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Does it really matter which one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「そんな適当にあたしの命を秤にかけないでくれる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Does my life mean that little to you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Does my life mean that little to you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわ…ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um... sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um... sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「出るわ。あっちよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Let's go to the other one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Let's go to the other one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「やっぱりあっちよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It's the other one, after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It's the other one, after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「疲れてきたよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm tired...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm tired...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「うるさいわねっ、こっちは命賭けてんのよっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Shut up! You want to bet your life on it being this one!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Shut up! You want to bet your life on it being this one!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわ…ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No... sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No... sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「出るわ。あっちよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Let's go to the other one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Let's go to the other one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「やっぱり、向こうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It's the other one, after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It's the other one, after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「何か、文句でも？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝What? You got something to say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝What? You got something to say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いえ…出ましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No... let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No... let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「やっぱ、向こうね。断然向こうよ。絶対向こう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It's the other one, after all. Definitely. No doubt.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It's the other one, after all. Definitely. No doubt.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、いこういこう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, let's go, let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, let's go, let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「違う…やっぱり向こうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Nope, it's the other one, after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Nope, it's the other one, after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ね、そろそろ決めない…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, isn't it about time to decide...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, isn't it about time to decide...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「だから、向こうって今、決めたじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I just said it was the other one. Isn't that a decision?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I just said it was the other one. Isn't that a decision?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ、向こうで決定ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, we've decided it's the other one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, we've decided it's the other one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「やっぱり向こうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It's the other one, after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It's the other one, after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「何か、文句でも？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝What? You got something to say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝What? You got something to say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕、こっちで待ってて、いいかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Can I just wait here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Can I just wait here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「パートナーが何言ってるのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝What are you saying, partner?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝What are you saying, partner?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だって、また戻ってくるでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, you'll be coming back anyway, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, you'll be coming back anyway, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「そんなことないわよ。今、向こうにするって決めたから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝That's not true. I've decided that it's the other one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝That's not true. I've decided that it's the other one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それもあっさり覆ると思うんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And you'll end up changing your mind...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And you'll end up changing your mind...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「ないわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝No I won't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝No I won't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「本当に？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「本当よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Really.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Really.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃ、いくよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, I'll go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, I'll go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「ええ。いきましょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Yeah, let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Yeah, let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「やっぱり、向こうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It's the other one, after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It's the other one, after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「何か、文句でも？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝What? You got something to say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝What? You got something to say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いえ…出ましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No... let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No... let's go.❞
